msbt.message: I hate to bug you kiddo, but I can't seem to catch
I can help!
Keep trying!
You know, I've been tryin' all day to catch one of them bugs I know they're rare and all, but it's kinda embarrassin' at this point!
I can help!
Don't give up!
Can't believe I'm admittin' this, but I can't seem to catch at all!
I can help you!
Keep trying!
You know what? I really wanna catch .I'd even settle for someone else catchin' one of 'em for me
I can help you!
Don't give up!
Oh yeah? Well, thanks a lot, kiddo!
, that'd be mighty nice of you!
You sure?! Well, I'm sure glad we talked!
Well, if you don't mind That'd make my day!
You're right. It'll mean more if I can net one on my own.
Yeah, you're right. I'll catch one sooner or later!
Yep. You're right. Thanks for bein' my voice of reason today. Gahaha!
Yep, yepa little more elbow grease is probably the answer.
Hey, ! You like catching bugs, right?I haven't been able to catch one o' them rhino beetles, them big ones with the crazy hornsCan you help an old out? Any kinda rhinoceros beetle'd work.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Hey, . I know you're good at bug catchin'.Back when I was young, I don't remember it bein' so blamed hard to catch myself a stag beetle Could you maybe catch one for me? Any stag beetle at all would work.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.
Hey, . I have a request for you a bug-catchin' request.I hear cicadas buzzin' all over, but I can't seem to grab oneThink you could catch one for me? Any kind of cicada'd do just fine.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

So , know how you're good at catchin' bugs? Well, I've got a request for you.I've been wastin' who knows how long tryin' to catch one o' those butterflies y'see flittin' around It's dang frustratin', I tell ya! If you could catch me any kind o' butterfly at all, I'd be grateful.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Need a favor, ! It's a bug-catchin' favorDragonflies are crafty fliers, makin' it mighty tough to get a net over 'em.I'd sure appreciate it if you could catch me one o' them critters. Any ol' dragonfly'd do just fine!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

, how would you feel about catchin' a bug for me?Been tryin' to catch a bug while it's pollinatin', but I keep scarin' 'em off with my clumsy ol' reflexes.You're young and spry Would you be willin' to snag a bug off a flower for your ol' pal ?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

So, you're a mite bit better'n me at catchin' bugs, Think you could catch one for me?Been tryin' to snag one off a stump, but I keep scarin' 'em off. I ain't exactly light on my feet no more.If you see a bug on a tree stump, any ol' bug at all, could you catch it for me? I'd be much obliged.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

, I got a request. Might say I'm fishin' for a favorDon't know what it is with freshwater fish and my shadow, but when they see me on the bank, they skedaddle. You seem to be able to reel 'em in. Think you could catch one for me?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Hey, You're good at fishin', right?Between waves, currents, and tides, I can't seem to figure out how to catch anythin' in the danged ocean. I guess I was sorta hopin' you'd catch me a saltwater critter, and show this ol' cuss how it's done.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.
Heya, . I could use your specific expertise with a little somethin' I'm in a slump, and I can't seem to get my hands on . Think you could nab one for me? I'm beggin' here!
Leave it to me!
Sorry.
I hate to admit it, but I can't catch for the life of me!
I'll get one for you!
Keep trying!
Really?! That'd be a huge help!
Eh, I understand. Don't sweat it, kiddo.
Hey, that'd be a big load off. Thanks!
Alright, guess it's back to the drawin' board
Hey! I got a favor to ask you!Sorry, that was kinda rude, but I'm gettin' desperate here. I need to get ! You think you could reel one in for me? I'd be mighty appreciative.
Leave it to me!
Sorry.

Sometimes I feel like I'm gonna go my whole life without ever catchin'
At this point, I'd even be happy if someone else could catch one for me.
I can help!
Don't give up!
You serious?! Well, !
Ah, it's just as well. I should just buckle down and get one myself.
If you're seriousthat'd be great!
Just gonna have to keep on tryin'. Thanks for encouragin' me, kiddo.
